mapper.select: SELECT SB.SEQ, EM.EMP_NAME AS EMP_NUM, SB.SIGN_SUBJECT, SB.SIGN_CONTENT, SB.REG_DATE, SB.SIGN_DATE, SB.SIGN_PERSON, SS.STATE_NAME AS SIGN_STATE FROM B_SIGNBOARD SB, B_EMPLOYEE EM, B_SIGN_STATE SS WHERE 1=1 AND SB.EMP_NUM = EM.EMP_NUM(+) AND SS.STATE_NUM = SB.SIGN_STATE AND SEQ = #{seq}

SELECT DDD.EMP_NAME, ra.RANK_NAME FROM (
SELECT signlist.EMP_NUM FROM B_EMPLOYEE employee, B_SIGN_LIST signlist WHERE employee.DEPARTMENT_NUM = signlist.DEPARTMANT_NUM AND employee.EMP_NUM = #{seq} ) A, B_EMPLOYEE DDD, B_RANK ra WHERE A.EMP_NUM = DDD.EMP_NUM AND ra.RANK_SEQ = DDD.RANK_SEQ
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO B_SIGNBOARD ( SEQ, EMP_NUM, SIGN_SUBJECT, SIGN_CONTENT, REG_DATE, SIGN_STATE, NEXT_SIGN ) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(SEQ),0) + 1 FROM B_SIGNBOARD), #{empNum}, #{signSubject}, #{signContent}, SYSDATE, #{signState}, #{nextSign} )

INSERT INTO B_SIGN ( SIGN_REQUEST, EMP_NUM, SIGN_DATE, SIGN_TEXT, BOARD_NUM, SIGN_YN ) SELECT CASE SING_FLAG WHEN 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS SIGN_REQUEST, EMP_NUM, null AS SIGN_DATE, null AS SIGN_TEXT, #{boardNum} AS BOARD_NUM, null AS SIGN_YN FROM B_SIGN_LIST WHERE DEPARTMANT_NUM = ( SELECT DEPARTMENT_NUM FROM B_EMPLOYEE WHERE EMP_NUM = #{empNum} )

INSERT INTO B_SIGN ( SIGN_REQUEST, EMP_NUM, SIGN_DATE, SIGN_TEXT, BOARD_NUM, SIGN_YN ) SELECT 'Y' AS SIGN_REQUEST, #{empNum} AS EMP_NUM, SYSDATE AS SIGN_DATE, null AS SIGN_TEXT, #{boardNum} AS BOARD_NUM, 'Y' AS SIGN_YN FROM SYS.DUAL
mapper.update: UPDATE (SELECT * FROM B_SIGN WHERE EMP_NUM = ( SELECT EMP_NUM FROM B_SIGN_LIST WHERE SING_FLAG = ( SELECT SING_FLAG FROM B_SIGN_LIST WHERE EMP_NUM=#{empNum} ) +1 ) AND BOARD_NUM = #{boardNum} ) A SET A.SIGN_REQUEST = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM B_SIGN WHERE BOARD_NUM = #{boardNum} ORDER BY EMP_NUM
